title: Using Mastodon is way too complicated to ever topple Twitter
content:
Great idea in theory, a total pain in practice.

Before Elon Musk blew up Twitter last week, I had no idea what Mastodon was. Chances are, neither did you. I had heard about the Twitter exodus to the platform: 665,000 users are said to have made the switch, propelling the platform past 1 million users since Muskâ€™s Twitter takeover. So I decided to join them and signed up not knowing what to expect.

Read Full Story
